dmp.title: Correlation between number of marriages in the EU/austria and students of public universities in austria
dmp.description: Experiment to find out if and how much the number of marriages in the EU and austria correlates with the number of students on public universities in austria.

dataset.title: Students on public universities in austria
dataset.description: Statistical data about marriages in austria and the EU used as input by the python program.

distribution.title: Studierende an öffentlichen Universitäten nach Uni.
distribution.description: CSV file showing data about students on public universities in austria.

distribution.title: Studierende an öffentlichen Universitäten nach Uni: C-SEMESTER-0 mapping
distribution.description: CSV file containing information to map SEMESTER-0 field to year.

dataset.title: Marriages in austria and the EU
dataset.description: Statistical data about marriages in austria and the EU used as input by the python program.

distribution.title: Marriages by sex and previous marital status.
distribution.description: CSV file showing data about marriages in the EU and austria.

dataset.title: Source Code
dataset.description: Source code to execute the experiment
dataset.preservation_statement: this data is relevant to reproduce the experiment and should be considered for long term preservation
dataset.data_quality_assurance: Different methods were applied to assure quality: Clear versioning, Naming conventions, clear project structure, etc.

dataset.title: Produced data
dataset.description: Data produced when executing the experiment.
dataset.data_quality_assurance: Different methods were applied to assure quality: Clear versioning, Naming conventions, clear project structure, etc.

distribution.title: Aggregated dataset
distribution.description: CSV file that contains data points that combines the number of students on public universities in austria with the numbers of marriages in austria and the EU

distribution.title: Correlation plot
distribution.description: HTML file showing a plot correlating the number of students on public universities in austria with the numbers of marriages in austria and the EU.
